description: Mountain Hardwear's lightest three-layer ski bibs designed with GORE-TEX® C-Knit™ shell fabric for premium waterproof protection and unparalleled breathability on human-powered backcountry missions, the High Exposure™ Bib handles wet snow conditions and technical mountain terrain.
name: Mountain Hardwear High Exposure GTX C-Knit Bib, Reg - Mens
